SunflowSharp is a C# port of the SunFlow render system, originally written in Java.


Features:
  * All features of the original SunFlow.
  * Dynamic loading of primitives, scene parsers, and shaders.
  * FreeImage texture loading, and render saving, supporting all image formats that FreeImage does.
